attributes.action: Bring back public hanging for convicted rapists, murders and child molesters
attributes.additional_details: Only hang when there is sufficient evidence as to not wrongly convict an innocent person.
attributes.background: Nobody, absolutely nobody likes these people and everyone can probably agree they all deserve to be hanged, its a pretty good deterrent for future offenders amd would more than likely stop the offences, and if not then we get to watch the sick people die before our very own eyes.
